message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product which I believe will be incredibly valuable to you.  My initial price is $14000.  Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Can you consider that?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still a bit higher than that. How about we split the difference? I'm willing to come down to $13000.  Let's make this happen!
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit too high. How about we meet in the middle at $12500?
